exordian_avenger:curlup.NAME: Curlup
exordian_avenger:curlup.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Exhaust.

exordian_avenger:grow.NAME: Grow
exordian_avenger:grow.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 strength. NL Exhaust. NL Recurrent 3.
exordian_avenger:grow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. Draw 1 card. NL Exhaus.t NL Recurrent 3.

exordian_avenger:countercard.NAME: Counter
exordian_avenger:countercard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains Strength, deal damage equal to !M! times the Strength it gained to the enemy.

exordian_avenger:defend.NAME: Endure
exordian_avenger:defend.DESCRIPTION: Loose !M! hp. NL Gain !B! Block. At the end of combat heal !M! hp.

exordian_avenger:perfectionism.NAME: Perfectionism
exordian_avenger:perfectionism.DESCRIPTION: Loose !M! hp. NL Avoid the next 2 times you would take Damage.

exordian_avenger:silencecard.NAME: Silence
exordian_avenger:silencecard.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Silence. Apply 1 Silence to yourself.

exordian_avenger:mania.NAME: Mania
exordian_avenger:mania.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies for every point of Strength you have.

exordian_avenger:silentnight.NAME: Silent Night
exordian_avenger:silentnight.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Silence and Weak to all Enemies. Every Enemy looses !M! Strength.

exordian_avenger:gnaw.NAME: Gnaw
exordian_avenger:gnaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust. NL Recurrent 1.

exordian_avenger:chew.NAME: Chew
exordian_avenger:chew.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Add a Gnaw to your hand. NL Exhaust
exordian_avenger:chew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Add an upgraded Gnaw to your hand. NL Exhaust.

exordian_avenger:bubble.NAME: Bubble
exordian_avenger:bubble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.

exordian_avenger:thirdhand.NAME: Third Hand
exordian_avenger:thirdhand.DESCRIPTION: Increase your maximum hand size by !M!. Do NOT Leave and rejoin combat with this power. That's cheating.

exordian_avenger:outrun.NAME: Outrun
exordian_avenger:outrun.DESCRIPTION: Keep Block for the next !M! turns. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust. NL Recurrent !M!.

exordian_avenger:actcute.NAME: Act Cute
exordian_avenger:actcute.DESCRIPTION: All enemies loose !M! Strength. ALL Attacks have Taunt.

exordian_avenger:spores.NAME: Poison Spores
exordian_avenger:spores.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply 2 Poison for every Poison Spores you have NL (Currently applies !M! Poison). NL Recurrent 1.

exordian_avenger:jitterbug.NAME: Jitterbug
exordian_avenger:jitterbug.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. Gain 1 Dexterity. Gain 2 Vulnerable. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust. NL Recurrent 2.

exordian_avenger:exhaustingSlash.NAME: Exhausting Slash
exordian_avenger:exhaustingSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. End your turn.

exordian_avenger:awakenaegis.NAME: Awaken Aegis
exordian_avenger:awakenaegis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Avoid the next !M! times you would take Damage.

exordian_avenger:soundwave.NAME: Renegade Soundwave
exordian_avenger:soundwave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable. NL Shuffle !M! Dazed into your Discard Pile.

exordian_avenger:backsnap.NAME: Backsnap
exordian_avenger:backsnap.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL The target looses !M! strength. NL Exhaust.

exordian_avenger:silententrance.NAME: Sneak
exordian_avenger:silententrance.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Silence. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
exordian_avenger:silententrance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Apply !M! Silence. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

exordian_avenger:chaos.NAME: Recurrent Chaos
exordian_avenger:chaos.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Discard !M! card. NL Recurrent 1
exordian_avenger:chaos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Discard !M! card. NL If this card is discarded, draw !M! card. NL Recurrent 1.

exordian_avenger:proficiency.NAME: Proficiency
exordian_avenger:proficiency.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card reoccurs, increase it's damage by !M!.

exordian_avenger:ramming.NAME: Relentless Ramming
exordian_avenger:ramming.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Recurrent 1. NL Exhaust.

exordian_avenger:twitch.NAME: Twitch
exordian_avenger:twitch.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Make a copy of a random card that will occur in 2 turns.
exordian_avenger:twitch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose a card to make a copy of, that will occur in 2 turns.

exordian_avenger:hemotoxicity.NAME: Hemotoxicity
exordian_avenger:hemotoxicity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you loose Health, apply !M! Poison to all Enemies.

exordian_avenger:remedy.NAME: Remedy
exordian_avenger:remedy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regeneration. NL Exhaust. NL Recurrent 1.
exordian_avenger:remedy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regeneration. NL Draw 1 Card. NL Exhaust. NL Recurrent 1.

exordian_avenger:imshook.NAME: Shake
exordian_avenger:imshook.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! shook. NL Exhaust. NL Recurrent 3.

exordian_avenger:spitstrike.NAME: Spitstrike
exordian_avenger:spitstrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! Spit to your hand.
exordian_avenger:spitstrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! Spits to your hand.

exordian_avenger:infinitespits.NAME: Infinite Spitting
exordian_avenger:infinitespits.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn add !M! Spit to your hand.
exordian_avenger:infinitespits.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn add !M! Spits to your hand.

exordian_avenger:hiphop.NAME: Hip Hop
exordian_avenger:hiphop.DESCRIPTION: Add a card from your reoccurring card pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.

exordian_avenger:razorclaws.NAME: Razorclaws
exordian_avenger:razorclaws.DESCRIPTION: Taunt. NL Deal !D! damage and !D! for every attack that occurred at the start of this turn.

exordian_avenger:repell.NAME: Repell
exordian_avenger:repell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Discard a card at random.

exordian_avenger:waitforit.NAME: Wait for it...
exordian_avenger:waitforit.DESCRIPTION: Loose 1 Strength. NL When this card reoccurs, gain 3 Strength. NL Exhaust. NL Recurrent !M!

exordian_avenger:stalling.NAME: Relentless Stalling
exordian_avenger:stalling.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Recurrent 1. NL Exhaust.

exordian_avenger:impress.NAME: Impress
exordian_avenger:impress.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every Attack card in your hand.

exordian_avenger:overcompensate.NAME: Overcompensate
exordian_avenger:overcompensate.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Draw 1 less card the next turn. NL  Exhaust.
